categories: Category:Imperial-class Star Destroyers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: The Silooth was the personal Imperial-class Star Destroyer of Grand Admiral Peccati Syn. He named it after the Silooth, a Sith animal.

The Silooth was vaporized by the New Republic forces during the Liberation of Kashyyyk, killing both Syn and Merili. The ship was caught in a crossfire beween Admiral Ackbar's Home One and Captain Verrack's Maria.
In a section of the Grand Admirals article that was cut, author Dan Wallace mentioned that the Silooth was originaly known as the Fi.
